name: Aftermath Y2K
description: Inspired by such games as Castlevania and Ninja Gaiden; aftermath is a NES styled action platformer. However in Aftermath you play as a dog. You must run, jump, and dodge your way through 8 levels to recover your beloved owner. All the while also trying to fend off thugs, bandits, henchmen, and mutants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 120 MB available space
